entries.text: StickerYou doesn’t only allow you to make custom stickers for your business. You can also brand your staff with custom name badges. It’s an easy way to tie it all together, amplifying your brand identity and letting your customers know you’re there to help them. StickerYou.com allows you to order any size, shape and quantity. Most companies will only sell to you if you buy at least 100. Whoa. Not cool. What are you waiting for? Get your team better name badges! Use code PERL10 at checkout for an exclusive Perl Weekly discount.
entries.title: Get premium custom name badges for your team at StickerYou.com
